name: Teia DAO governance prototype
description: The Teia DAO governance contract where proposals are submitted, voted and executed

expansion.string: The account that executed the entry point is not a DAO token holder
The account that executed the entry point is not the proposal issuer or the DAO guardians
The account that executed the entry point is not the DAO or the DAO administrator
The account that executed the entry point is not the DAO or the DAO representatives
The account that executed the entry point is not the DAO or the DAO guardians
The DAO member or representative has already voted the proposal
The account that executed the entry point does not have enough DAO tokens to vote the proposal
The given proposal id doesn't exist
The proposal status is still open, so it cannot be evaluated
The proposal voting period has passed and it is not possible to vote it anymore
The proposal is still in the waiting period, so it cannot be executed
The proposal status is not open, so it is not possible to vote it anymore
The proposal status is not approved, so it cannot be executed
The proposal status is not open or approved, so it cannot be cancelled anymore
